**Data Integration in Food and Agriculture (DIFA)** is an organization of scholars whose research focuses on food and agricultural policy issues. Our mission is to produce better evidence on major policy issues, with a particular focus on agriculture, food, nutrition, and health topics. 

Please read more about us on our "About Us" page, and learn about our past and upcoming events on our "Events" page.
